member.name: PSS_VA_SPACE_ENTRY
member.summary: Holds the returned by PssWalkSnapshot for a virtual address (VA) region.

member.name: PSS_VA_SPACE_ENTRY.BaseAddress
member.summary: Information about the VA region. For more information, see .

member.name: PSS_VA_SPACE_ENTRY.AllocationBase
member.summary: Information about the VA region. For more information, see .

member.name: PSS_VA_SPACE_ENTRY.AllocationProtect
member.summary: Information about the VA region. For more information, see .

member.name: PSS_VA_SPACE_ENTRY.RegionSize
member.summary: Information about the VA region. For more information, see .

member.name: PSS_VA_SPACE_ENTRY.State
member.summary: Information about the VA region. For more information, see .

member.name: PSS_VA_SPACE_ENTRY.Protect
member.summary: Information about the VA region. For more information, see .

member.name: PSS_VA_SPACE_ENTRY.Type
member.summary: Information about the VA region. For more information, see .

member.name: PSS_VA_SPACE_ENTRY.TimeDateStamp
member.summary: If section information was captured and the region is an executable image (MEM_IMAGE), this is the TimeDateStamp value from the Portable Executable (PE) header which describes the image. It is the low 32 bits of the number of seconds since 00:00 January 1, 1970 (a C run-time time_t value), that indicates when the file was created.

member.name: PSS_VA_SPACE_ENTRY.SizeOfImage
member.summary: If section information was captured and the region is an executable image (MEM_IMAGE), this is the SizeOfImage value from the Portable Executable (PE) header which describes the image. It is the size (in bytes) of the image, including all headers, as the image is loaded in memory.

member.name: PSS_VA_SPACE_ENTRY.ImageBase
member.summary: If section information was captured and the region is an executable image (MEM_IMAGE), this is the ImageBase value from the Portable Executable (PE) header which describes the image. It is the preferred address of the first byte of the image when loaded into memory.

member.name: PSS_VA_SPACE_ENTRY.CheckSum
member.summary: If section information was captured and the region is an executable image (MEM_IMAGE), this is the CheckSum value from the Portable Executable (PE) header which describes the image. It is the image file checksum.

member.name: PSS_VA_SPACE_ENTRY.MappedFileNameLength
member.summary: The length of the mapped file name buffer, in bytes.

member.name: PSS_VA_SPACE_ENTRY.MappedFileName
member.summary: If section information was captured, this is the file path backing the section (if any). The path may be in NT namespace. The string may not be terminated by a NULL character. The pointer is valid for the lifetime of the walk marker passed to PssWalkSnapshot.
